alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:31PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DELAWARE...NORTHERN ADAIR AND NORTHEASTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 731 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Oaks to 6 miles southeast of Peggs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Siloam Springs... Westville... West Siloam Springs... Kansas... Watts... Oaks... Eldon... Proctor... Christie... Scraper... Twin Oaks... Baron... Ballard... Natural Falls State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
